snippet: ZIEGELMAN--Marjorie. The community of West End Synagogue, A Reconstructionist Congregation, deeply mourns the loss of a major figure in its founding 30 years ago. Marjorie worked diligently with her husband Aaron to bring the congregation into being. West End, among many other beneficiaries in countless institutions, should always remember our debt to the Ziegelman family for their commitments and kindnesses. Along with our thanks, our sympathies to Aaron and their daughters Jane and Amy and their families. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZIEGELMAN--Marjorie. The community of West End Synagogue, A Reconstructionist Congregation, deeply mourns the loss of a major figure in its founding 30 years ago. Marjorie worked diligently with her husband Aaron to bring the congregation into being. West End, among many other beneficiaries in countless institutions, should always remember our debt to the Ziegelman family for their commitments and kindnesses. Along with our thanks, our sympathies to Aaron and their daughters Jane and Amy and their families. 1/3
